If the request is made less than 10 days in advance, the employee may be required to provide proof of the unforeseen circumstances that led to the request.
In addition, if an employee wishes to take a congé payé during the school year (May-October), they must make their request at least one month in advance and preferably by the 15th of the month preceding the leave. This will allow for a more informed decision regarding the leave request.
